  • public class SpannableUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains text, and formatting related functions.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.CharSequence bold(java.lang.CharSequence... content)
      Returns a CharSequence that applies boldface to the concatenation of the specified CharSequence objects.
      static java.lang.CharSequence color(int color, java.lang.CharSequence... content)
      Returns a CharSequence that applies a foreground color to the concatenation of the specified CharSequence objects.
      static java.lang.CharSequence italic(java.lang.CharSequence... content)
      Returns a CharSequence that applies italics to the concatenation of the specified CharSequence objects.
      static java.lang.CharSequence normal(java.lang.CharSequence... content)
      Returns a CharSequence that removes applied type faces.
